messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Scientology & mental illness
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks, I read them.  I loved the msdewey link! ... From: Heather  To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com Sent: Thursday, February
messages.messageBody:
Thanks, I read them. I loved the msdewey link!


----- Original Message ----
From: Heather <heather@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, February 8, 2007 6:01:22 PM
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Scientology & mental illness

You might want to google (or msdewey.com <g>) Scientology & mental
illness. You'll get a ton of hits.

Here are two that were at the top of my list...

http://www.sptimes com/TampaBay/ 111498/Hubbard_ s_teachings_ g.html

Scientology' s war on psychiatry
Salon Magazine/July 1, 2005
http://www.rickross .com/reference/ scientology/ psychiatry/ psychiatry11. html

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
